name: Recovery, Flexibility & Injury Prevention
description: Enhancing mobility, preventing injuries, and promoting active recovery for optimal combat and movement performance.

workout_groups.name: Yoga-Based Mobility Flow
workout_groups.description: Blending yoga poses and controlled breathing to enhance flexibility, stability, and joint resilience.

workouts.name: Combat-Ready Sun Salutation
workouts.description: A modified Sun Salutation sequence emphasizing core control, hip mobility, and breathing synchronization.

workouts.name: Dynamic Warrior Flow
workouts.description: Move between Warrior I, II, and III poses to develop balance and combat mobility.

workouts.name: Deep Lunge-to-Bridge Transitions
workouts.description: Stretch the hip flexors, hamstrings, and spine by dynamically transitioning between a deep lunge and a bridge.

workouts.name: Pigeon Pose with Active Hip Rotation
workouts.description: Hold pigeon pose while actively rotating the hip to enhance mobility.

workouts.name: Seated Spinal Twists
workouts.description: Engage in deep spinal twisting to release tension and improve torso flexibility.

workouts.name: Low Stance Hip Openers
workouts.description: Hold a wide squat stance and gently shift weight side to side to open the hips.

workouts.name: Standing Balance Flow
workouts.description: Transition between tree pose, warrior III, and standing knee lift to develop single-leg balance.

workouts.name: Hollow Body Core Stability Hold
workouts.description: Hold a hollow body position while maintaining controlled breathing.

workouts.name: Wall-Assisted Handstand Hold
workouts.description: Use a wall for support while holding a controlled handstand to develop wrist stability and spinal alignment.

workouts.name: Dragon Pose with Torso Twist
workouts.description: Hold a deep lunge while twisting towards the front leg, improving rotational flexibility.

workouts.name: Wrist & Forearm Strength Flow
workouts.description: Perform a series of wrist stretches and weight-bearing movements to enhance wrist resilience.

workouts.name: Active Bridge & Shoulder Stretch
workouts.description: Flow between a bridge position and an overhead reach to strengthen the posterior chain and enhance spinal flexibility.

workouts.name: Combat-Ready Deep Squat Hold
workouts.description: Hold a deep squat position with an upright torso, engaging hip flexors and ankle mobility.

workouts.name: Explosive Frog Stand to Press Handstand
workouts.description: Transition from a deep frog stand into a controlled press handstand.

workouts.name: Rolling Shoulder Mobility Flow
workouts.description: Perform controlled rolling shoulder stretches to increase range of motion.

workouts.name: Bridge Walkouts
workouts.description: Hold a bridge position while slowly walking hands and feet forward and backward.

workouts.name: One-Legged Downward Dog to Kick-Up
workouts.description: Flow from downward dog into an explosive leg kick, strengthening balance and flexibility.

workouts.name: Progressive Splits Training
workouts.description: Gradually deepen into a split while maintaining active muscle engagement.

workouts.name: Back Bridge Kickovers
workouts.description: Kick over from a back bridge into a standing position for extreme spinal mobility.

workouts.name: Wall-Assisted Handstand Push-Ups
workouts.description: Perform controlled handstand push-ups against a wall to build upper body and shoulder endurance.

workout_groups.name: Combat Yoga Flow
workout_groups.description: A tactical approach to yoga, blending mobility, balance, and warrior resilience with combat-ready applications.

workouts.name: Tactical Sun Salutation
workouts.description: A modified Sun Salutation designed for warriorsâ€”integrating explosive transitions, deep lunges, and core activation.

workouts.name: Warrior Transition Drills
workouts.description: Flow between Warrior I, II, and III while maintaining combat-ready stance alignment.

workouts.name: Lunge-to-Kick Flow
workouts.description: Move from a deep lunge to a controlled front kick, focusing on hip mobility and balance.

workouts.name: Combat Lotus Mobility Sequence
workouts.description: Dynamic lotus flow designed for hip opening, flexibility, and transitioning into ground defense positions.

workouts.name: Tactical Cobra Flow
workouts.description: Explosive cobra pose movements, engaging the lower back and core while preparing for striking posture.

workouts.name: Combat-Ready Deep Squat Transitions
workouts.description: Hold a deep squat and transition between different foot stances for balance and leg endurance.

workouts.name: Bridge-to-Backbend Recovery
workouts.description: Transition from a bridge to a full backbend, strengthening the spine and posterior chain.

workouts.name: Low Stance Side Flow
workouts.description: Flow between side lunges and deep squats, mimicking low combat footwork.

workouts.name: Explosive Plank-to-Arch Flow
workouts.description: Move from a plank into an arch position dynamically, mimicking a breakfall-to-stand transition.

workouts.name: Dynamic Balance Warrior
workouts.description: Hold and transition between Warrior III, Tree Pose, and one-legged squat to enhance stability.

workouts.name: Arch-Hold Core Flow
workouts.description: Flow from arch pose into a hollow-body hold, engaging deep core muscles for combat conditioning.

workouts.name: Dragon Pose Transitions
workouts.description: A dynamic lunge sequence that stretches the hip flexors while improving balance and footwork mobility.

workouts.name: Handstand-to-Splits Flow
workouts.description: Kick up into a handstand, lower into splits, and transition seamlessly.

workouts.name: Rolling Shoulder Mobility Yoga
workouts.description: Controlled rolling shoulder movements combined with deep lunges to improve rotational flexibility.

workouts.name: Combat Reverse Lunge Flow
workouts.description: Step back into a lunge while maintaining guard positioning, then flow into a counter-kick stance.

workouts.name: Spinal Decompression & Recovery
workouts.description: Series of spinal mobility stretches to enhance recovery and flexibility.

workouts.name: Silat Low Stance Recovery Flow
workouts.description: Flow between deep Silat crouching stances and rotational balance transitions.

workouts.name: Explosive Arm Balance Flow
workouts.description: Transition between crow pose, handstands, and press-ups for advanced upper body control.

workouts.name: Dynamic Arch & Hollow Flow
workouts.description: Alternate between an arch hold and a hollow body position, engaging deep core and spinal flexibility.

workouts.name: Combat-Ready Mobility Recovery
workouts.description: Controlled breathing and slow-motion movements designed for active recovery while maintaining combat posture.

workout_groups.name: Dynamic Stretching & Warmups
workout_groups.description: Pre-workout mobility drills designed to prime muscles and joints for high-performance movement.

workouts.name: Leg Swings (Front to Back)
workouts.description: Dynamically open the hips by swinging the legs forward and backward.

workouts.name: Lateral Arm Circles
workouts.description: Engage the shoulders by rotating the arms in controlled circles.

workouts.name: Dynamic Hip Opener Lunges
workouts.description: Step forward into a lunge, actively shifting the hips to improve mobility.

workouts.name: Thoracic Spine Rotations
workouts.description: Twist the upper back in a kneeling or standing position to improve rotational mobility.

workouts.name: Explosive Knee Drive Warmups
workouts.description: Perform rapid knee drives to activate hip flexors and fast-twitch muscle response.

workouts.name: Combat Stance Step-Throughs
workouts.description: Step through different fighting stances dynamically, improving footwork fluidity.

workouts.name: Breakbeat Bounce Warmup
workouts.description: Bounce lightly on the balls of your feet in rhythm, mimicking evasive combat movement.

workouts.name: Low Stance Mobility Drill
workouts.description: Move fluidly between a deep squat, lateral stance, and horse stance to open the hips.

workouts.name: Rolling Shoulder Warmups
workouts.description: Roll shoulders forward and back, integrating core engagement for combat-ready movement.

workouts.name: Jeet Kune Do Explosive Lead Step
workouts.description: Perform a fast lead step forward and back, activating fast-twitch footwork muscles.

workouts.name: Silat Low Step Transitions
workouts.description: Glide between low fighting stances, improving leg strength and mobility.

workouts.name: Explosive Lateral Step Jumps
workouts.description: Jump laterally while keeping your combat guard up, training movement reactivity.

workouts.name: 360-Degree Rotation Drills
workouts.description: Practice rapid body rotation movements, improving agility and balance in combat.

workouts.name: Capoeira Cartwheel Flow
workouts.description: Flow between cartwheels and foot placements for agility and body control.

workouts.name: Explosive Depth Step Rebounds
workouts.description: Step off a low box or ledge and immediately spring into an evasive lateral jump.

workouts.name: Shaolin Dynamic Flexibility Flow
workouts.description: Move between Shaolin flexibility stances at high speed, improving reactive range.

workouts.name: Tactical Blindfolded Warmup
workouts.description: Perform evasive footwork and shadow movements with a blindfold, heightening body awareness.

workouts.name: Muay Thai Knee Drive Recoil
workouts.description: Explosively drive a knee forward and recoil back into a defensive stance.

workouts.name: Baguazhang Circle Warmup
workouts.description: Walk in a circular combat stance while maintaining a ready guard.

workouts.name: Explosive Sprint Activation
workouts.description: Perform short, explosive sprints to wake up fast-twitch muscle fibers before training.

workout_groups.name: Post-Workout Active Recovery
workout_groups.description: Techniques for cooling down, reducing soreness, and accelerating muscle recovery.

workouts.name: Breath-Controlled Deep Stretching
workouts.description: Slow, deep stretches combined with controlled breathing to enhance recovery.

workouts.name: Foam Rolling Leg Recovery
workouts.duration: 3 sets of 30 seconds per muscle group
workouts.description: Roll out quads, hamstrings, and calves to reduce tightness.

workouts.name: Gentle Spinal Decompression
workouts.description: Hang from a bar or lay on the ground in a gentle arch to decompress the spine.

workouts.name: Controlled Joint Rotations
workouts.description: Slowly rotate ankles, wrists, shoulders, and neck to improve joint recovery.

workouts.name: Progressive Relaxation Training
workouts.description: Systematically tense and release each muscle group to improve relaxation.

workouts.name: Combat Recovery Stretch Flow
workouts.description: Flow through deep stretches that target muscles stressed from combat-style training.

workouts.name: Lying Hip Opener & Back Release
workouts.description: A supine stretch combining hip mobility and spinal decompression.

workouts.name: Muay Thai Shin & Foot Recovery
workouts.description: Gently massage and stretch the shins and feet to relieve impact stress.

workouts.name: Yoga-Based Breathing Reset
workouts.description: Inhale deeply through the nose, hold, and exhale slowly to calm the nervous system.

workouts.name: Active Recovery Rolling Drill
workouts.description: Perform soft rolls along the floor to ease tension in the spine and back muscles.

workouts.name: PNF Stretching for Hamstrings
workouts.description: Use Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation (PNF) techniques to stretch deeper.

workouts.name: Tai Chi Flow for Recovery
workouts.description: Perform slow, controlled Tai Chi movements to promote relaxation and flexibility.

workouts.name: Cold Exposure Breathwork (Wim Hof-Style)
workouts.description: Controlled deep breathing paired with cold water immersion or ice packs to boost recovery.

workouts.name: Hanging Spinal Recovery
workouts.description: Hang from a bar with relaxed shoulders to decompress the spine and improve grip recovery.

workouts.name: Combat Stance Mobility Drill
workouts.description: Slowly move through fighting stances to release tension in the legs and core post-training.

workouts.name: Self-Massage with Lacrosse Ball
workouts.description: Use a lacrosse ball to apply pressure to sore areas and release muscle knots.

workouts.name: Neck & Jaw Tension Release
workouts.description: Gentle self-massage and stretching to release tension in the neck and jaw from combat stress.

workouts.name: Silat Low Stance Mobility Recovery
workouts.description: Transition through deep Silat stances slowly to stretch and relax leg muscles post-training.

workouts.name: Baguazhang Circular Walking Cooldown
workouts.description: Walk in controlled circular movements, focusing on deep breathing and balance.

workouts.name: Tactical Cold Water Hand Recovery
workouts.description: Submerge hands in cold water to reduce inflammation and improve finger dexterity post-training.

workouts.name: Explosive Fighter Recovery Stretching
workouts.duration: 3 sets of 30 seconds per muscle group
workouts.description: Stretch explosively trained muscle groups, focusing on hamstrings, shoulders, and back.

workouts.name: Mental Reset Visualization
workouts.description: Visualize a full recovery process while deep breathing to enhance post-training relaxation.
